spatial_accuracy.notes: Door for the bedroom is missing in the render. Window placements are neglected or replaced with solid walls. General layout and room adjacency are correctly interpreted.

structural_fidelity.notes: The utility room wall configuration is simplified. The bedroom entrance does not feature a proper door opening (E1). Toilet duct/shaft area is incorrectly modeled.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture items including the round dining table, grey sofas, and specific bedding colors. Only minor orientation shifts in kitchen fixtures.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with soft lighting. Textures are simplified but effective for a 3D conceptualization. Geometry is clean without mesh artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Missing bedroom door and balcony entrance door frames.
Misplaced kitchen sink and stove elements relative to the L-shaped counter.
Incorrect orientation of the washing machine in the utility space.
Distorted proportions of the bathroom/toilet interior wall dividing the fixture zones.
